name: Geocoder
description: This widget lets you find geocordinates using the XMLHttpProxy using the Yahoo Geocoder service.

events.name: onGeocode
events.description: publishes to its topicName when getCoordinates is called (via button or jmaki function call). It publishes an object with id and value. The value is has the following structure {success,results}. results is {latitude,longitude,address,city,state,zip}
